t: Amazon.com Balance and Amazon.com Gift Card Terms and Conditions - Amazon Customer Service

t: Redeem an Amazon Gift Card - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you haven't already redeemed your physical gift card to your account, you can enter your claim code during checkout. To do it, select Use a gift card, voucher, or promo code during checkout. This page will show all your payment methods and provide a section to enter the claim code.

t: Amazon.com: Amazon.com Gift Card Balance Reload : Gift Cards
s: Want to set it and forget it? You can set up Auto-Reload to schedule automated fund transfers to your balance--either when your funds drop below a certain amount or on a regularly scheduled daily, weekly, or monthly basis.

t: Reload with your Prepaid Card

t: What Is Promotional Balance On Amazon | CitizenSide
s: November 6, 2023 - Amazon offers various types of promotional balances to provide customers with different opportunities to save money. Here are some common types of promotional balance you may come across: Product-specific promotions: These are promotions that offer a specific discount or credit for purchasing a particular product or category. For example, you may find promotions that provide a $10 promotional balance when you purchase a specific brand ...
